Description: Cardboard box containing red ochre powder, wrapped in tissue, and small solid pieces of red ochre, separately wrapped (below powder).
Curator's comments: Published in: Regulski, I. (ed.), 2022. Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt, p. 215
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
